p: DPPH radical–scavenging assay:In this spectrophotometric method, DPPH was used as a reagent to measure the DPPH free radical–scavenging activity of the hydrodistilled (HD) and nanoemulsions of the S. satureioides essential oil in comparison with TROLOX and ascorbic acid. The absorbance was measured at 517 nm using a spectrophotometer (Cecil 2010, Cecil Instr. Ltd., Cambridge, UK) [ 33]. All tests were repeated three times, and the results were averaged.
